attributes.action: Save Death Or Glory Records, Redditch
attributes.additional_details:
We have a non profit independent local record shop in Redditch, Worcestershire called 'Death Or Glory Records' the shop is due to close in 2 months due to no funding from the local councils or the government. This is a place where unsigned musicians can play gigs and sell their music and band merchandise. It also stocks vinyls and vintage clothing.

Without this shop there will be nowhere for local artists, musicians and bands to showcase their talents
